sources.title: The Fighting Gentleman (1932) PRE-CODE HOLLYWOODüçï WILLIAM COLLIER, JR.
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Stars: William Collier Jr., Josephine Dunn, Natalie Moorhead
Featuring: James J. Jefferies (aka The Great White Hope) as Referee
Director:  Fred C. Newmeyer
üçïA CLASSIC SPORTS DRAMA THAT PACKS A PUNCHüçï
In this Pre-code Hollywood rarity from director Fred C. Newmeyer and Monarch Productions, a grease monkey leaves his wrenches behind and steps into the ring of pro boxing. Will he find success and happiness as The Rock-bye Kid? 

This gripping boxing movie stars William Collier Jr., Josephine Dunn, and Natalie Moorhead in a tale of ambition, love, and redemption. Fans of classic movies, sports drama, and pre-Code Hollywood gems will revel in the intense storylines and raw emotional performances that define this era of cinema.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

#ClassicMovies #SportsDrama #PreCodeHollywood #VintageCinema #PizzaFLIX

metadata.Plot: A young mechanic loses an amateur fight at a carnival, and sets out to train hard to become a professional boxer.
metadata.Actors: William Collier Jr., Josephine Dunn, Natalie Moorhead, Crauford Kent
